ValidationRule.description: US-0007032 [AU] Conditional Mandatory validations for "eBay User Id" new text field in Object "Project"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eBayAUEnterprise', ISPICKVAL(EBH_Stage__c, 'Live to Site'),OR( ISBLANK(EBH_Seller__c) ) ) ,true ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following field is mandatory for Stage "Live to Site" : Seller
